extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE    A Grade of C+ in 6.0 units from HIST 300-329 and registration in a HIST Major or Medial Plan.

basic.description: An examination of the development of revolutionary theory and practice from the French Revolution to the present, showing the continuity and evolution of revolutionary technique under changing social and economic conditions.
basic.subject: HIST
basic.title: Revolutionary Warfare in the Modern Era
